                         Object defaultValue)
                  throws CSysTableException
Description copied from interface: ISysExtendableTable
Add a new column with the given name.
Depending on the implementation of this interface the class of this value can be used as column type.

Specified by:
appendColumn in interface ISysExtendableTable
Parameters:
columnName - The name of the new column.
defaultValue - This value is used as default for all new rows.

CSysTableException - if the given default value is null.
